entries.title: These are some of the notable companies laying off workers
entries.description: The tech, mortgage and auto industries are among the hardest hit with layoffs going into 2023. Among the giant companies are Amazon, Meta and Twitter.

entries.title: What to know about OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT
entries.description: Microsoft hopes it can use ChatGPT to resuscitate its search engine, Bing.

entries.title: These companies will pay you for your data. Is it a good deal?
entries.description: Public sector “data dividends” never took off. Now private companies are paying for data — on their own terms.

entries.title: U.S. government is not investigating Elon Musk’s Twitter purchase
entries.description: Foreign investors backing the deal drew scrutiny, but officials appear to have decided not to look further.
